title: The Bethlehem Fiasco
description: With only one sane man in the desert, can the answers he seeks be found? Or will it be the death of him? In a time when hobgoblins and angels run amok, can the universe survive the petty struggles of the powers that be?Based on as yet unreleased papyrus scriptures found in a 2nd floor bedsit in Lewisham, England, this is the 'true' story of one man."Irreverent, quirky and fun" Fredrik Nath (The Cyclist)"...a light and breezy read..." Iso Nuys (Paid on Return)"I loved it!" Dave Tarragon (The Chemo Diaries)
author: Dani J. Caile
